text: Ara ekajana muminera pakse ucita naya ba ekajana mumina narira'o naya ye yakhana allah o tamra rasula kono bisaye sid'dhanta niyechena takhana tadera se byapare tadera jan'ya kono matamata thake. Ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œke o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare se tahale niscaya'i bipathe geche spasta bipatha gamane.
